short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate the input text to different Languages and Read aloud the Text. Save pdf for the Text, Find word in Dictionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Translate the input text to different Languages and Read aloud the Text. Save pdf for the Text, Find word in Dictionary. It can do the following tasks:
1-Convert Text to other Languages.
2-Select Any Text, right click on it,Click on Extension name and speak the Text in Selected 
3-Speak Input Text.
4-Speak Output Text.
5-Save Input Text in pdf form.
6-Save Translated Text in pdf form.
7-Extract Text from images.
8-Search input word and Translated words directly in Dictionary.
9-Search input word and Translated words directly in Wikipedia.
10-Search input word and Translated words directly in ChatGpt.
11-Detect copied Text Language and set it automatically.
12-Search input word and Translated words directly in ChatGpt.
13-Voice input and Translated voice Output.
14-Find Countries by Language.
